responseText: NSLOCTEXT("[70199B914E7E03A9706A1499CF20B1FD]", "5ABCA029434723BBFAEF67B6E2828ABC", "The Purifier\'s said to be keeping Lionhold together, but I\'m more focused on practical help and real action. Faith is important, but I believe we need more than that to truly make a difference.")
name: DD_RVR_Lionhold_Villager05_4_Response
